title: Pilgrim's Bottle
marks:
Signature and Date

See signed on bottom, incised: [Michele Holzapfel/ 9/ \'89]
description: flattened, circular (or lozenge) shape; small mouth with slightly raised lip; small foot ring; mottled coloration; inherent dark v-shaped incision near bottom on one side
creditline: Gift of Ruth and David Waterbury
